name: Enviro 200P
Relevant Australian Standards Checked
Specification / Standard: AS3740 - 2010, Manufacturer’s Technical Data Sheet
Check Substrate. Check for cracks/defect in concrete. Check critical areas (puddle flanges, penetrations, expansion joints, rebates/setdowns).
Attach Photo
Prepare Substrate. (moisture test if required) prepare surface to accept primer using a scraper or grinder and vacuum or sweep residual debris.
Attach Photo
Apply primer - Enviro Shield or Enviro Prime WB
Attach Photo
Caulking/Joints. Apply bondbreaker at junctions (where applicable)
Attach Photo
Apply first coat of Enviro 200P Ultra with a brush or roller.
Attach Photo
Apply second coat of Enviro 200P Ultra with a brush or roller. Achieve 0.8mm WFT and 1.0mm DFT.
Attach Photo
Testing. Flood test
Attach Photo
First signoff. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured. Check for any pinholes and bubbles. Sign-off from builder.
Check Screed (moisture test if required, Enviro Shield is moisture tolerant.)
Attach Photo
Prepare surface. Surface is to be free of protrusions.
Attach Photo
Apply first coat of Enviro Shield with a brush or roller.
Attach Photo
Apply second coat of Enviro Shield with a brush or roller.
Attach Photo
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
